verbs.description: TOKYO ( AP ) — [ARG1: Asian shares] [V: were] [ARG2: mostly higher] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] but little changed as market players tried to digest the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jon

TOKYO ( AP ) — Asian shares were mostly higher Tuesday but little changed as [ARG0: market players] [V: tried] [ARG1: to digest the summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jon]
